overview: Oscar, a guy in his forties, is passing an existential crisis. He decides to quit his job as a state worker and a relationship with his girlfriend in order to set up a new business: A club for pot enthusiasts. The place is intended to be free of rules, but  trouble shows up when those rules begin to be necessary...
tagline: Nah. I see no problems through this haze.
title: Smoking Club (129 normas)
